formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: \( \text{Deflection} = \frac{q \times L^4}{K \times E \times I} \) where \( q \) is the load, \( L \) is the length, \( E \) is the modulus of elasticity, and \( I \) is the moment of inertia.
